description:
This substantial shovel is the tool of choice for base campers, canoeists, and kayakers, where weight isn't a big issue. Excellent for excavating sanitation facilities, or digging postholes in the beach to set up driftwood poles for your tarp. A flat panel lets you tap in tent stakes with ease.

  • Heat-treated carbon steel blade
  • Glass filled nylon handle with rubberized grip
  • Scoop pivots to fold flat and the handle telescopes for packing
  • Carry sack included
name: Gerber Gorge Folding Shovel
